name: Zucchini Alfredo with Grilled Chicken
ingredients: 2 ounces freshly grated parmesan cheese, 1/2 cup
3-4 boneless chicken breasts, seasoned, grilled and cubed

instructions.en: Cut zucchini into thin 'pasta' sized strips.
Heat oil in skillet. Saut√© zucchini and garlic until tender but not mushy. Season with salt. Transfer to serving bowl and keep warm.
In same skillet, heat cream cheese on medium-low until melted and smooth.
Gradually blend in cream until smooth. Stir in parmesan and seasonings. Cook over low heat until smooth and creamy, thinning with water if needed.
Add cubed chicken and stir to coat with sauce.
Serve chicken and sauce over zucchini 'pasta'.
